Request a demo
Asset Manager

The Percolate Asset Manager is the first content repository build directly into your marketing workflow. No more navigating rogue file storage tools to download, transfer, and upload files before you can start working. Now, you can store, share, and access your assets, workflows, campaigns and collaboration all in one place.

Global search and tagging

Quickly find assets using Percolate's global search and faceted navigation. Smart Collections dynamically identify similar assets and combine them into a single folder for simpler discovery.

GE removed the barriers to collaboration across all geographies and business lines.

Learn more

Versioning and Asset History

Briefs

At each stage of the asset lifecycle — from planning to creation, collaboration, modification and publication — Percolate automatically saves and updates assets into the Asset Manager.

Deliver on-time, on-brand campaigns

Campaigns

Campaigns is a centralized place for your team and agency partners to collaborate on your initiatives. Percolate combines workspaces, activity streams, files, and tasks in one place. See the status of all your campaigns without status update meetings.

Learn more about Percolate
